code: import{createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';import weatherService from'../services/weatherService';const initialState={name:null,weather:null,main:null,wind:null};const weatherReportSlice=createSlice({name:'weatherReport',initialState,reducers:{setWeather:(state,action)=>{const weatherReport=action.payload;state=weatherReport;return state;}}});export const fetchWeatherReport=city=>{return async dispatch=>{const weatherReport=await weatherService.getCity(city);dispatch(setWeather(weatherReport));};};export const{setWeather}=weatherReportSlice.actions;const weatherReportReducer=weatherReportSlice.reducer;export default weatherReportReducer;
